channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-15784] Vectorization: Turn on text vectorization by default (vector serde)
item.description:
Turn ON text vectorization related variable hive.vectorized.use.vector.serde.deserialize by default.

Row-mode (hive.vectorized.use.row.serde.deserialize) is handled by a separate JIRA HIVE-16222)
item.summary: Vectorization: Turn on text vectorization by default (vector serde)

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

Doc note: The default value of hive.vectorized.use.vector.serde.deserialize needs to be updated in the wiki for release 2.2.0. (Please format the change of default with a bullet list, like for hive.mapred.mode.)

  • hive.vectorized.use.vector.serde.deserialize
  • formatting example: hive.mapred.mode

Added a TODOC2.2 label.
